Speech to Text: See a red dot on the face, can you please identify it?
Doctor's Response: With what I see, I think you have a severe case of acne, likely a combination of comedonal and inflammatory acne given the presence of numerous red bumps, pimples, and possible cysts on your face. I would suggest trying topical creams or gels containing benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid to help reduce bacteria and inflammation, and oral antibiotics may be necessary if the condition is severe, additionally maintaining good skincare habits such as keeping the face clean and avoiding picking or popping pimples can also help alleviate the condition.
